mapper.insert:
insert into authorized_config
authorized_code, password, company_id, brand_ids, big_type, small_type, small_type_ids, product_ids, state, user_id, unit_price, pay_status_value, pay_model_value, terminal_imei, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark, valid_time, valid_state, activity_id, authorized_code_type, is_open, activity_details, start_time,
valid_day, price_strategy, valid_strategy, activity_ids,
#{authorizedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{payStatusValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payModelValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{terminalImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authorizedCodeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{validDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceStrategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validStrategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update authorized_config
authorized_code = #{authorizedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_ids = #{brandIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, big_type = #{bigType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, small_type = #{smallType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, small_type_ids = #{smallTypeIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_ids = #{productIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pay_status_value = #{payStatusValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_model_value = #{payModelValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, terminal_imei = #{terminalImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_code = #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, att1 = #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, att2 = #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numa1 = #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, numa2 = #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_time = #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid_state = #{validState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, authorized_code_type = #{authorizedCodeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid_day = #{validDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price_strategy = #{priceStrategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_strategy = #{validStrategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_ids = #{activityIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from authorized_config where 1=1
and authorized_code like CONCAT(#{authorizedCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ORDER BY RIGHT(authorized_code,5) DESC

SELECT
FROM authorized_config WHERE valid_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND NOW() AND is_deleted = 0 AND state = 1 GROUP BY user_id

SELECT , (SELECT count(1) FROM authorized_config a1 WHERE a1.state = 1 AND a1.is_deleted = 0 AND a1.valid_state = 1 AND a1.user_id = ac.user_id ) as notOutCount FROM authorized_config ac WHERE valid_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND NOW() AND is_deleted = 0 AND state = 1 GROUP BY user_id
SELECT count(*) FROM authorized_config WHERE state = 1 AND is_deleted = 0 AND valid_state = 1 AND user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(ac.id) from authorized_config ac left join base_company bc on bc.id = ac.company_id where ac.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ac.state = 1 and bc.business_type = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT ac.* FROM authorized_config AS ac LEFT JOIN base_company AS bc ON (ac.company_id = bc.id) LEFT JOIN base_brand AS bb ON (ac.brand_ids = bb.id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ac.user_id = #{userId} AND ac.state = 1 AND ac.is_deleted = 0 AND ac.valid_state = 1 AND ac.type = #{type}

SELECT
FROM authorized_config WHERE user_id = #{userId} and valid_state = 1 and authorized_code_type = 1 and is_open = 1 order by valid_time
